node.title: 'Trifecta' of big hail, wind and rain bound for the east as brutal heat sets in up north
node.description: Yet another round of widespread rainfall is underway in the east this weekend. The tropics,Â meanwhile, are set to swelter all the way into next week.
node.content:
["Yet another round of widespread rainfall is on the way in the east this weekend, while\u00a0the tropics are set to swelter all the way into next week.", "According to the Bureau of Meteorology's Jackson Browne the rain\u00a0is expected to set in over eastern South Australia, south-west Queensland and western New South Wales today as a trough extends across the country.", "While severe storms could\u00a0be in the mix, Mr Browne says they are expected to be less severe than the huge supercell thunderstorms we saw in October.", "On Sunday a low pressure system is expected to form and drive more rain, but where exactly it is set to go is still a bit uncertain.", "\"It has been a bit of a source of forecast frustration,\" Mr Browne said.", "But he is confident it will track somewhere over the north and east of NSW.", "On Sunday\u00a0widespread falls of 25 to 50 millimetres are expected over north-eastern NSW, with heavier falls of 50 to 100 millimetres if you are under one of those severe thunderstorms.", "
No end in sight
", "How much rain will hit those catchments currently in flood will largely depend upon where exactly the low goes.", "But Mr Browne warned that while some locations might miss out this weekend, with La Nina on our doorstep, these rounds of wet weather are\u00a0going to keep coming.", "\"So if it's not this one, it may be the next one, or it might be the third one,\" he said.", "Another round is forecast for next week.", "\"We've had pretty solid rainfall over the winter months, as well as the very active storm season,\" Mr Browne said.\u00a0", "", "
Over the next week many parts of the country are expected to get\u00a0another drenching.(Supplied: Bureau of Meteorology)
", "Catchments are sodden and the atmosphere is primed.", "Many changing warnings are expected over the next few days, so\u00a0keep up to date\u00a0in your area at\u00a0ABC Emergency.", "
Not your regular build-up
", "Meanwhile much of the tropical north is forecast to experience heatwave conditions over the weekend and into next week.", "", "
It is expected to be even hotter and more sticky\u00a0than normal over parts of northern Australia this weekend.(Supplied: Bureau of Meteorology)
", "It might only\u00a0be a few degrees warmer than usual, but that will combine with increased moisture to result in oppressive conditions \u2014 hot days followed by warm nights.", "Mr Browne says the build-up will be worse than normal.\u00a0", "\"That's coming from an ex-Territorian who did\u00a0forecasting in Darwin for a good eight years,\" he said.", "Mr Browne encouraged\u00a0people\u00a0to take care of themselves over the next few days and said staying hydrated was particularly important.", "\"If you do have access to cooling, like air conditioning,\u00a0fans, make sure you're using it, make sure you're using it overnight to give your body a chance to recover,\" he said."]
